WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is sort of a gradual thing -- closing for now. You'll see substantial performance improvements starting with the 0.9.x.x release
WorkItem.Description:
Is there any way to optimise things when using large definition files such as winrt.d.ts

http://typescript.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/view/fe3bc0bfce1f#typings%2fwinrt.d.ts

The file is a chunky definition, over a meg, and it can cause the IDE to slow down a bit.

Comments.Message: Scalability is something we definitely care about - we're working on it :)
You could minify *.d.ts files using JSMin and remove all :any type annotations.
